mapper.sql: Id, orderId, Remark, sourceType, Source_Id, createTime, productType, lastModifyTime
mapper.insert: insert into orderitem (Id, orderId, Remark, sourceType, Source_Id, createTime, productType, lastModifyTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update orderitem set orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceType = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, Source_Id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, productType = #{productType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastModifyTime = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
